i really enjoy this variation of tower defense games where the player also participates in the battle there is something about the mobs being able to give you a lovetap if you wander too close that really sells the idea of you defending against a siege of sorts  orcs must die 2 has satisfying mechanics a good amount of variation in maps and a solid selection of enemies to keep things fresh for a good amount of playtime i hope you give it a go
